scripts.build: bun run --filter tui build && bun run --filter ai build && bun run --filter agent build && bun run --filter coding-agent build && bun run --filter mom build && bun run --filter web-ui build && bun run --filter pods build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta" "bun run --filter ai dev" "bun run --filter agent dev" "bun run --filter coding-agent dev" "bun run --filter mom dev" "bun run --filter web-ui dev" "bun run --filter tui dev"
scripts.dev:tsc: concurrently --names "ai,web-ui" --prefix-colors "cyan,green" "bun run --filter ai dev:tsc" "bun run --filter web-ui dev:tsc"
scripts.check: biome check --write . && tsgo --noEmit && bun run --filter web-ui check
